name: interchangeably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that can be exchanged without making any difference or without being noticed: be used interchangeably The fuels can be mixed or used interchangeably These garments could be worn interchangeably by men and women. See
interchangeable
More examplesFewer examplesArtists use the words interchangeably to refer to the arrangement of the elements in a painting.Today Surinamese speak Sranan interchangeably with Dutch.Figs can be used interchangeably with dried apricots, prunes and dates.
